statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY patient_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, surgical_history FROM patient_records WHERE surgical_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female' AND surgical_history LIKE '%Appendectomy%'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, surgical_history FROM patient_records WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patient_records WHERE surgical_history IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM patient_records
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, timestamp FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, timestamp FROM patient_records WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY age, timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM surgical_history WHERE surgery_type = 'Appendectomy'
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE id = 1
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM surgical_history WHERE surgery_type LIKE '%append%' AND surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM surgical_history WHERE surgery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT surgery_type, surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM surgical_history WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM analysis_data WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date FROM analysis_data ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM surgical_history ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, surgery_type FROM patient_records JOIN surgical_history ON patient_records.patient_id = surgical_history.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM surgical_history WHERE surgeon_name LIKE '%Smith%';

SELECT patient_name, surgery_type, analysis_result FROM patient_records JOIN surgical_history ON patient_records.patient_id = surgical_history.patient_id JOIN analysis_data ON surgical_history.surgery_id = analysis_data.surgery_id ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, gender, blood_type FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM surgical_history WHERE surgery_type = 'Appendectomy' ORDER BY surgery_date ASC;
SELECT surgery_type, cost FROM surgeries WHERE cost > 5000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, last_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY last_name, age;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, blood_type FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND blood_type='A+';

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, s.surgery_type, s.cost FROM patients p JOIN surgical_history sh ON p.patient_id = sh.patient_id JOIN surgeries s ON sh.surgery_type = s.surgery_type WHERE s.cost > 5000 ORDER BY s.cost DESC;

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, a.appointment_date, a.appointment_type, a.notes FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY a.appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT surgery_type, date_performed, surgeon_name FROM Surgeries ORDER BY date_performed DESC;
SELECT name, specialization, experience_years FROM Doctors WHERE experience_years > 10;
SELECT staff_name, role, department FROM MedicalStaff ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT Patients.name, Surgeries.surgery_type, SurgicalHistory.outcome FROM Patients JOIN Surgeries ON Patients.patient_id = Surgeries.patient_id JOIN SurgicalHistory ON Surgeries.surgery_id = SurgicalHistory.surgery_id;
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE experience_years >= 10 ORDER BY specialization, name;

SELECT Patients.name, Surgeries.surgery_type, SurgicalHistory.outcome FROM Patients JOIN Surgeries ON Patients.patient_id = Surgeries.patient_id JOIN SurgicalHistory ON Surgeries.surgery_id = SurgicalHistory.surgery_id WHERE Patients.age < 50 ORDER BY SurgicalHistory.date_performed DESC;
SELECT Doctors.name, MedicalStaff.staff_name, MedicalStaff.role FROM Doctors JOIN MedicalStaff ON Doctors.specialization = MedicalStaff.department ORDER BY Doctors.name ASC, MedicalStaff.role DESC
